reporter_caption.center: RITTNER v. FULTON CTY., 128 Ohio St.3d 1456 (2011)

caption.center: State ex rel. Rittner v. Fulton Cty.

opinion.opinion_text:
Merit Decisions Without Opinions.
On respondents' motion to dismiss and relator's motion to file out of rule and for other relief. Motion to dismiss granted. Motion to file out of rule denied. Cause dismissed.
O'Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O'Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
